content: KCM-WF-ST Kwik Cast setting tool Kwik Cast setting tool for wood form anchors/inserts (KCM-WF, KCC-WF, KCCM-WF) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Cast-in anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Improved speed and comfort â€“ setting tool allows anchors to be fed from the top, eliminating the need to bend down when using a hammer to install cast-in anchors in wood form deck The tool allows anchors to be installed between rebar and to correct tilted anchors that cannot be reached with a hammer Applications Installing cast-in-place concrete anchors/inserts in wood forms ### TECHNICAL DATA: Anchor type: Accessories Head configuration: N/A Material composition: Cast-iron, Plastic Technical Data | Anchor type | Accessories | Head configuration | N/A | Material composition | Cast-iron, Plastic | PROFIS Software | No ### ITEMS- 2206205 - Setting tool KCM-WF-ST anchor feeder - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCM-ST Setting tool assy
